src/pon2/private/intrinsic

        pext
      • pext(a, mask: uint16): uint16
      • pext(a, mask: uint32): uint32
      • pext(a, mask: uint64): uint64

This module implements intrinsic functions. Note that AVX2 is disabled on Windows due to some bugs.

Compile Options:

OptionDescriptionDefault
-d:pon2.avx2=<bool>Use AVX2 instructions.true
-d:pon2.bmi2=<bool>Use BMI2 instructions.true

Consts

UseAvx2 = true
UseBmi2 = true

Parallel bits extract.
